text: Sakhile Nyoni-Reiling is a Zimbabwean-born pilot living in Botswana. She was the first female pilot in Botswana and the first woman to serve as general manager of Air Botswana. In 1988, Nyoni became the first female pilot in Botswana, working for Air Botswana. In 2011, she became the first woman to serve as general manager of Air Botswana. ==References== Category:20th-century Zimbabwean women Category:21st-century Zimbabwean women Category:Zimbabwean expatriates in Botswana Category:Botswana aviators Category:Female commercial aviators Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Sakhile Nyoni
